channel.title: Comments on: Indexes in MongoDB: A quick overview
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Bob
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description: Nice explanation on the use of indexes in mongo. Showing what is coming back in the mongo shell is very helpful in understanding what is actually going on behind the scenes if you are using one of the drivers.
item.content:encoded: Nice explanation on the use of indexes in mongo. Showing what is coming back in the mongo shell is very helpful in understanding what is actually going on behind the scenes if you are using one of the drivers.
